name: Void Blast
description:
*****READ BEFORE PLAYING*****

-Void Blast is an Endless 2D Bullet Hell Game In Which You Consume Your Enemies to Gain Their Powers There Are Various Enemy Types. I Hope You Like My Game  And Enjoy It And I Would Love To Get Some Feedback And Thank You Very Much :)

*****CONTROLS*****

-WASD Keys To Move

-Mouse To Aim and Left Click To Shoot

-You Gain Shooting Powers By Colliding With An Enemy Which Will Steal Their 

Power And The Appropriate Effect Will Be Rendered
